defaults.ds: The symbols that are considered medium are SYM4, SYM5, SYM6 and SYM7.
The Free Spins nudge only occurs during Free Spins.
The FreeShield reels are selected with a 1 in 3 chance on the first 5 freespins given that the total win for that game round is less than 20 xbet.
The shieldwall will start on reel 0(A) if there are no medium symbols on reel0, otherwise on reel1(B).
The shield wall can start on row 1, 2 or 3 with equal distribution.

Collected Nitro symbols are stacked in the Nitro Collect Meter from bottom to top.
Each new Free Spins round starts with an empty Nitro Collect Meter.
If a Nitro symbol appears above an overlay Multiplier Wild, it is counted as both a Nitro symbol and a Multiplier Wild symbol.

A full Stacked Wild symbol covering all positions on reel 1 in Free Spins, activates the Copy Cats feature, turning all cat symbols into Wild symbols. A Stacked Wild symbol is a Wild symbol that covers 3 positions on a reel.

The Free Spins start with the player racing against Twitch, the first opponent.
After collecting the final 3 Nitro symbols when racing against Bruiser, the last opponent, the player races until the end of Free Spins.
Free Spins are played at the same bet level and coin value as the round that activated Free Spins.

Amount must be greater than the bet amount.
Both single Viking symbols and stacked Viking symbols on the reels are transformed when the Hotspot Feature is activated.
In the main game, there is a Hotspot that covers reel 3.

When a fully stacked Viking symbol lands completely in the Hotspot area, all other Viking symbols in the play area outside of the Hotspot are transformed into the Viking symbol that landed in the Hotspot area.
The Hotspot Feature is only activated when the same symbol covers all 3 reels in the Hotspot.
After all Viking symbols on the reels are transformed into the symbol in the Hotspot, all wins are evaluated and paid. No wins are paid after the initial activation of the Hotspot Feature.
After transformation, the Viking symbols are evaluated according to the Scatter Pays section in the Paytable with all Viking symbols displayed anywhere on the reels taken into consideration.
If 2 or 3 fully stacked symbols land in the Hotspots, the symbol furthest to the left will be the one that all of the other Viking symbols inside and outside of the Hotspot transform into.
The Hotspot and Shield Wall Features are played at the same bet level and coin value as the spin that activated the Hotspot and Shield Wall Features.
If Pick and Click is won.
Collect 3 Nitro symbols to race against the next opponent.
Tap the switch to turn the intro screen on or off.

Vikings Video Slot™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 243 betways video slot. The game features a Hotspot Feature, a Shield Wall Feature, a Raid Spins symbol and a Raid Spins mode with 3 Hotspots on reel 2, 3, and 4. In Raid Spins, the game becomes a 7-reel, 5-row, 78,125 betways video slot.

Vikings Video Slot Touch™ is a 5-reel, 3-row, 243 betways video slot. The game features a Hotspot Feature, a Shield Wall Feature, a Raid Spins symbol and a Raid Spins mode with 3 Hotspots on reel 2, 3, and 4. In Raid Spins, the game becomes a 7-reel, 5-row, 78,125 betways video slot.

Use the default browser for the device or upgrade your system.
After collecting 3 Nitro symbols, the game moves to the next level. The player wins a random overlay Multiplier Wild and the next racing opponent appears.
If a player collects 2 Nitro symbols in one spin, and 3 Nitro symbols in the next spin, the 2 Nitro symbols remaining are carried forward and are accounted for in the next level.
The Multiplier Wilds are Wild symbols.
The Multiplier Wilds have the same multiplier as the reel (1-5) they have landed on.

If the Hotspot has not activated and the total win is less than 100 x the bet and additionally there is a 3 symbol stack that has landed 1 step below one of the Hotspots the medium stack will be nudged into the Hotspot.

If the player collects 3 coin win symbols, a coin win is awarded with a random multiplier of between x8 and x30 of the initial bet.
After the feature is activated, a Pick and Click game begins.
There are 4 different prizes for the player during the Pick and Click game: a coin win, Crosstown Traffic Free Spins, Purple Haze Free Spins and Little Wing Free Spins.
The game is played with 10 bet lines (fixed), 1-10 bet levels and different coin values.
The game is played with 243 Ways to Win (78,125 in Raid Spins), 1-10 bet levels (20 coins per level) and different coin values.
Three Raid Spin symbols appearing on reels 3, 4 and 5 in the main game activate Raid Spins.
Raid Spins can not be re-activated during Raid Spins and no additional Raid Spins spins can be awarded during Raid Spins.
Raid Spins are played at the same bet level and coin value as the spin that activated Raid Spins.
During Raid Spins, wins after a Hotspot transformation can pay both Scatter Pays and Bet ways coinciding on a spin. For those scenarios the wins are evaluated separately and then added together.

In Raid Spins, the Shield Wall can be activated after the payout for a Raid Spins spin is evaluated in case of a win or before the completion of the spin if there are no wins already on that spin but never on a spin when the Hotspot transformation occurs.
In Raid Spins, the Shield Wall size will either by 4x2, 5x2 or 5x3 symbols.
After Raid Spins are completed, the total win from Raid Spins is added to any wins from the round that activated Raid Spins.
After Raid Spins are completed, the total win from Raid Spins is added to any wins from the round that activated Raid Spins.
After Raid Spins are completed, the total win from Raid Spins is added to any wins from the round that activated Raid Spins.
Stops Autoplay if Raid Spins is won.

Feature Spin wins are added to any initial bet line wins.
Free Spin wins are added to any initial bet line wins.

MAX BET plays the game at 243 bet ways in the main game (78, 125 bet ways in Raid Spins), the highest bet level, and the current coin value. When playing at any lower bet level, MAX BET must be clicked twice to play the round at the selected level.
The Pick and Click feature is activated when 3 Scatter symbols appear on the reels. The Scatter symbols appear on reels 3, 4 and 5.
When a fully stacked Viking symbol lands completely in the Hotspot, Scatter Pays is activated.
After the characters have transformed into the same Viking symbol, the win is evaluated in accordance with the table below:
Scatter Pays wins awards the amount displayed in the Paytable multiplied by the bet level.
3 Bonus symbols appearing anywhere on reels 1, 3 an 5 only, in Free Spins, activate 10 additional Free Spins.
On a spin that results in no wins or symbol transformation, there is a chance that the Shield Wall Feature is activated.
In both the main game and in Raid Spins, the Shield Wall appears as a cluster of mystery symbols that appear on random areas of the reels. Once they have appeared, all wins are evaluated.
The Shield Wall Feature can only be activated on a spin when no Hot Spot Feature or Raid Spins are activated or no win occurs.
The Shield Wall Feature appears as either a cluster of 3x2 or 5x2 symbols.
The symbols that can be selected for the Shield Wall Feature are any of the Viking symbols with a face appearing on them.
Bet way wins for Viking symbols can either be formed by single or stacked symbols or by mixing the two kinds.
Stop if Pick and Click is won
Stop if Raid Spins is won
3 Bonus symbols appearing anywhere on reels 1, 3 and 5 only, in the main game, activate 10 Free Spins.
Collect 3 Nitro symbols to race against the next opponent in Free Spins.
Pick & Click to win Crosstown Traffic Free Spins
Pick & Click to win Purple Haze Free Spins
Pick & Click to win Little Wing Free Spins
The total win field includes any wins during Raid spins added to any wins from the round that activated Raid Spins.
You need to update your browser to be able to play. Minimum requirement: {0}
In Raid Spins, the game transforms into a 7-reel, 5-row, 78,125 betways playing area.
Seven Raid Spins are awarded with 3 Hotspots on reels 3, 4, and 5.

When a fully stacked Viking symbol lands completely in one or more of the Hotspot areas, all other Viking symbols in the play area outside of the Hotspots and inside the Hotspots are transformed into the same Viking symbol that landed fully stacked in the Hotspot area.
Vikings Video Slot™ Touch Game Rules
Any one of the 4 symbols with a face on it is a Viking symbol.
Any bet line win with Multiplier Wild symbols multiplies the bet line win by 1-5 respectively.
Multiplier Wild symbols can appear anywhere on reels 1-5 and substitute for all symbols, except Scatter symbols and Nitro symbols.
Wild symbols substitute for all symbols except Scatter symbols.
Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Bonus symbols.
The Purple Haze Feature is activated when the Purple Haze symbol lands on reel 1.
When the Purple Haze symbol lands on reel 1, symbols 10, J, Q , K and A transform into Wild symbols for that spin only.
The Purple Haze symbol on reel 1 acts as a Wild symbol after Wild transformation has occurred.

The maximum total win in coins for each game round is capped at 200 000 multiplied by the bet level. If at any point the total win amount of the game round exceeds this value the game round will finish, regardless of whether or not there are Raid Spins remaining, and the win amount of the cap value is awarded.
